description: This file defines a team of agents for stock research, including their configuration and a main execution block that runs a stock price query asynchronously.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent with a name, model, role, and tools.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model configuration.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents with specific configurations.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Tools for fetching stock data and related information from Yahoo Finance.

methods.name: team.aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously prints the response of the team to a given prompt, streaming output.
